Keywords: Armor , Future , Horsemen , Past , Quiet Council , Ruler
Real Name: En Sabah Nur
Special Powers
SURVIVAL OF THE STRONGEST: Apocalypse has [Cosmic Energy team ability]. // When Apocalypse KO's an opposing character, give him a Strength token.
MOLECULAR CONTROL: Charge, Phasing/Teleport, Plasticity. Apocalypse has Giant Reach: X, where X is the number of his Strength tokens.
PSIONIC POWER: Incapacitate, Penetrating/Psychic Blast. // Apocalypse has additional targets equal to the number of his Strength tokens.
THE STRONG WILL SURVIVE: Invulnerability, Regeneration. // Modify Apocalypse’s attack and defense value +1 for each Strength token he has. // When Apocalypse uses Regeneration, you may remove any number of Strength tokens to increase the amount healed by 1 for each token removed.

vamroc
I think what you're hoping for is your opponent to have a "generator" so Apocalypse can just accrue Strength tokens like crazy. The rule of three applies to combat values so Apocalypse could get to seven or eight targets after KOing enough generated minions.
June 16, 2021
pokolo
I think he’s too many points still… the strength tokens only being given when he KO’s seems like it might b difficult to b pull off enough, especially with his modest defense numbers throughout the dial meaning he might not even last long enough to pull it off… if it was every time he hit and 2 when he KO’d would b better… but I can’t rly justify reaching for this guy over the recent SR or chase or even the upcoming SR when they are like 100 points less… they should have adjusted his point value to b more in line with those or given him even more than they did here
